title: Sword Art Online Alternative: Gun Gale Online - Refrain

Sword Art Online Alternative: Gun Gale Online Episode 5.5
alternative_titles.ja: ソードアート・オンライン オルタナティブ ガンゲイル・オンライン 5.5話「ルフラン」

synopsis:
Following the conclusion of the first ever Squad Jam, Pitohui is eager to see what she missed, dying to know how everything went down. To satiate her desires, M reviews footage of the competition with her, commentating on the trials that he and LLENN faced together.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
